text:
ISBN-13: 9780747266976.

Title: Black Evening.
Subtitle: .
Authors: David Morrell.
Categories: Short stories.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=H9JsPwAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: From the American heartland to the edge of Hell, David Morrell, the bestselling author of the classics FIRST BLOOD and THE BROTHERHOOD OF THE ROSE, presents a career-spanning examination into his own life - and the fears we all share. From his first published short fiction to his latest, award-winning stories BLACK EVENING includes: 'The Beautiful Uncut Hair of Graves' - Winner, Best Novella, Horror Writers of America Award, 'Orange is for Anguish, Blue for Insanity' - Winner, Best Novella, Horror Writers of America Award and 'Dead Image' - Nominee, Best Novella, World Fantasy Award..
Published Year: 2000.
Average Rating: 3.85.
